com.fluidops.iwb.api.solution
Interface SolutionService

All Superinterfaces:
ExternalSolutionService, java.rmi.Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractSingleFileBasedSolutionService, ChainBasedSolutionService, DirReferenceBasedSolutionService, ZipFileBasedSolutionService
public interface SolutionService
extends ExternalSolutionService

Service to handle solutions.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

install

InstallationResult install(java.io.File solution)
Install these parts of the solution that allow installation at start-time.

Parameters:
solution - a handle to the solution. The specific target depends on the implementation. This could for example be a zip-file or the "unzipped" solution-folder.
Returns:
an InstallationResult or null, if the handle solution could not be processed at all (e.g. since it was in an "unknown" format).

detectSolution

java.io.File detectSolution()
Detects a solution "handle". This is of the same "type" as the handle that is passed to install(File).

Returns:
a "handle" to a solution or null, if none was found.

detectSolutions

java.net.URL[] detectSolutions()
Detect solution "handles". These are of the same "type" as the handles that are passed to ExternalSolutionService.install(java.net.URL)

Returns:
an array of URLs to solutions or null, if none were found.

addHandler

void addHandler(SolutionHandler<?> handler)
